bioconda.name: n50
bioconda.summary: A command-line tool to calculate the N50 value of a set of sequences and other utilities.

biocontainers.name: n50
biocontainers.summary: A script to calculate n50 from one or multiple fasta/fastq files available via bioconda

biotools.summary: A script to calculate N50 from one or multiple FASTA/FASTQ files available via BioConda

bioschemas.name: n50 calculator
bioschemas.summary: A script to calculate N50 from one or multiple FASTA/FASTQ files available via BioConda
